title: Optimal film thickness and Sn oxidation state of sputter-deposited SnO2 electron transport layers for efficient perovskite solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00911H, Paper
Woo Seok Suh, Geon Ho Park, Song Hyeun Jung, Yu-Na Lee, Hui-Seon Kim, Jia Hong Pan, Wan In Lee
Ultra-thin SnO2 films, fabricated at low temperatures, exhibit outstanding performance as electron transport layer (ETL) in perovskite solar cells (PSCs). To better understand the electron transport characteristics of SnO2 films,...
